AntCamera Class Reference
[3d-engine of BoA]

a camera object for moving over a height map

This function provides functions for moving a camera about and computation of the used 4x4-matrixes for camera-view and lighting (mainly used for shadows) More...

Detailed Description

a camera object for moving over a height map

This function provides functions for moving a camera about and computation of the used 4x4-matrixes for camera-view and lighting (mainly used for shadows)
